$interpreted: Hestia: Haha, thank you everyone~
Platypus: Kekekeke~
Hestia: Pang, Puggi, so you guys are here as well?
Puggi: Hearty Hestia~
Pang: This guy here told us that he's bringing us to a party. What are we celebrating?
Hestia: Today is the 10-year anniversary of my arrival at Maple Lake. Therefore, they said that they have to hold a celebration for me~
Puggi: 10-year anniversary? So just like us, you came from a foreign location as well?
Pang: If so, where is your birthplace?
Hestia: Hmm...I'm not certain myself either.
Hestia: I was just a tiny fish when I was abducted to Maple Lake. For that reason, I have absolutely no memory about my birthplace...
Puggi: Abducted!? Does that mean you were kidnapped and brought here by force?
Pang: Hmm...could it be...
Hestia: Pang, do you know something?
Pang: On borders of East Alliance, there's this group of mysterious aquatic creatures.
Pang: I've personally never seen one. However, from my comrades' descriptions, they seem to share a lot of features with you...
Hestia: For real!?

Puggi: Hearty Hestia's home is definitely there. 
We should find a good day and ask Pang to take you there...
Puggi: Ooh, I forgot. Pang has been banned from entering the East. Then how about I be the one who takes you back, you cool with that~
Hestia: Thank you for your kindness. However, I want to stay at Maple Lake because...I've been waiting for someone for all these years.
Puggi: Who're you waiting for?
Hestia: When I was kidnapped back then, I was locked inside this tiny fish tank.
Hestia: Just when I was helpless. this really handsome prince smashed the fish tank and saved me.
Hestia: He said, "Are you alright? Since I'm here, you don't have to be scared anymore!"
Pang: Handsome prince?
Hestia: Yes. He wanted me to stay at Maple Lake for a while. Once the danger has passed, he would return and we would leave together.
Hestia: Therefore, I'm still waiting for him to this very day.
Puggi: A prince from ten years ago...he should be a smelly old man by now, right?
Hestia: NO, HE WON'T! He will definitely be as handsome and suave as he used to be back then!
Karnulla: Holding a party, ey? How could you exclude us from the fun?
Karnulla: Bambinos, Platypuses everywhere, all you can eat! A grand buffet for everyone!
Karnulla: Hmph, so the ambush has failed?
Hestia: Picking fights with us for no reason at all. Is causing trouble for us your hobby or what!?
Karnulla: I shall let you guys off easy this time. Bambinos, let's go!
Karnulla: It has been so long. I bet that your prince has already forgotten about you. Have fun waiting for him for the rest of your life!
Hestia: What did you say!?
Hestia: ......
Pang: Hestia, do not dwell on Karnulla's words.
Hestia: Of course I won't. Why would I care about the childish nonsense he said!
Puggi: Yeah. You've been waiting for ten years. At worst, you wait another ten. If he still hasn't shown up by then, you can wait another...
Pang: Watch your mouth!
Puggi: Ehahaha, you think those fatty paws of yours are gonna get me every single time?
Pang: Stay right there, you noisy fat bird!
